string.value: #p12000# is worried that his daughter in #b#m60000##k is too scared of monsters to come home. To clear a path for her, he asked you to defeat 7 #r#o0130101#s#k and let #b#p20100##k know. \n #k \n#o0130101# #r#a10221# #k
You let #p20100# know you got rid of all those troublesome #o0130101#s. Yes!
Hmm, seems you just started an adventure. Good for you. My daughter, on the other hand, is still young and not brave enough to travel around...\r\n#b#L0#You have a daughter?#l

I sure do. She is the cutest and nicest creature in the entire world. She went to #b#m60000##k to look at the sea and hasn't come back yet. I'm sure she's afriad of the monsters on the path home. Could you help her?

Then please eliminate #r7 #o0130101#s#k. There are tons of #o0130101#s from #m1010000# to #m60000#. They're what's keeping #p20100# from returning home, you know. When you get rid of them, let #b#p20100##k know it's safe to come home. Thank you.
Did you need soemthing? Huh? You were asked to eliminate #o0130101#s for me? That wasn't the reason I didn't go home… Anyhow, thank you nonetheless. Sorry for making you go through all that trouble.
Some day, I'll leave here and see beyond Maple Island.
Hmmm... Haven't you met #b#p20100##k yet? Try to find the most beautiful girl in #b#m60000##k.
If you want to leave Maple Island, speak with that handsome captain.
